name: The Underscorers (_ers)
description:
Text based shooter game! In early access currently, but updates will be coming, at full release it will have boss fights, more levels, a character system, and eventually I will release _ers 2  on PyGame to make it 2D! Play the latest version here: https://trinket.io/python/a5dbcf348e?outputOnly=true&runOption=run Updates:

0.3.1 - integrated the 2 modes together

0.3 - One of a Kind - new mode, new weapon, 2 new abilities, and an event system

0.2.1 - bug fix relating to stun grenades

0.2 - Shards of Light - 2 new weapons, 2 new grenades, a new ability, and more quips!
